item.description:
IMPORTANT! This event has been rescheduled from its originally planned date.

Former regular sushi meetup attendees Claire and Chuck, who moved to the distant lands of the Midwest, return for a weekend and would like to see some of their old friends from the Providence area. Everyone is welcome.

We're going to be seated around an hibachi table, so feel free to watch the show and enjoy whatever mix of hibachi and sushi suits your preference!

This is a completely different and unrelated event from the official sushi meetup: feel free to attend either or both, but of course Claire and Chuck will only be at this one.

group.name: The Rhode Island Sushi Meetup Group

item.name: Return of Claire and Chuck
